text: The Paedophile Information Exchange (PIE) was a UK pro-paedophile activist group. It started in October 1974. In 1975 PIE had their first open meeting. Mothers threw rotten fruit and vegetables at members. That year the National Council for Civil Liberties (NCCL) gave PIE affiliate status. ==References== Category:1974 establishments in the United Kingdom Category:1984 disestablishments in the United Kingdom Category:Child sexual abuse
title: Paedophile Information Exchange
